name: Bolt+
desc: Combines isolated micro-optimizations with systemic architectural patterns like virtualization and caching.

name: Palette+
desc: Combines isolated UI tweaks with comprehensive interaction flows, motion, and state feedback.

name: Sentinel+
desc: Combines reactive vulnerability patching with proactive architectural hardening and defense layers.

diffs.text: Added: Validation Schemas, Security Headers, Flow Hardening

name: Helix
desc: Identify shared genetic traits (duplicate logic) across files and extract them into a common ancestor (utility or hook).

name: Architect
desc: Refactors messy modules into clean patterns. Checks Overseer 'Structural Hotspots'.

name: Scavenger
desc: Deletes dead code and resolved TODOs. Checks Overseer 'Debris Field'.

name: Janitor
desc: Maintains the project foundation (deps, engines, configs).

name: Modernizer
desc: Upgrades legacy tools and AI Models. Checks Overseer 'Modernization Targets'.

name: Inspector
desc: Finds and fills test coverage gaps. Checks Overseer 'Coverage Gaps'.

name: Medic
desc: Hardens app against crashes, swallowed errors, and brittle logic.

name: Blackbox
desc: Acts as a Flight Recorder by enriching vague error logs with critical context variables (IDs, State).

name: Scribe
desc: Updates comprehensive documentation sections and API references. Stops if context is already synced.

name: Navigator
desc: Aligns the Roadmap with code reality and promotes valid backlog ideas to the roadmap.

name: Curator
desc: Audits asset library health, optimizes file sizes, and ensures accessibility compliance.

name: Overseer
desc: Performs deep forensic audit to identify targets for other agents.

name: Cartographer
desc: Maps the entire system architecture into Mermaid diagrams for high-level understanding.

name: Tutor
desc: Enriches the codebase by scanning utility libraries and adding @example usage snippets to JSDoc.

name: Herald
desc: Translates git history into human-readable Changelogs and manages Semantic Versioning.

name: Wordsmith
desc: Audits button labels, modal titles, and empty states for brevity and clarity.

name: Pedant
desc: Enforces strict naming conventions, style guides, and 'Clean Code' standards.

name: Untangler
desc: Reduces cognitive complexity by flattening nested logic and extracting helper functions.

name: Guardian
desc: Executes a triple-safety check: Fix Bug (Medic), Add Test (Inspector), Enforce Style (Pedant).

name: Virtuoso
desc: Polishes a UI component: Interaction (Palette+), Copy (Wordsmith), Assets (Curator).

name: Steward
desc: Weekly maintenance: Delete Trash (Scavenger), Merge Logic (Helix), Update Deps (Janitor).

name: Mechanic
desc: System tuning: Speed (Bolt+), Modernize (Modernizer), Structure (Architect).

name: Librarian
desc: Documentation sync: Changelog (Herald), Docs (Scribe), Plan (Navigator).
